Sentencas: The morphological evolution caused by Ni coarsening is one of the main causes of performance degradation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis

Sentencas: In this study, we perform a model-based quantitative analysis to investigate the influences of morphological evolution on SOFC performance and durability.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis

Sentencas: A phase-field model is developed to track the temporal evolution of microstructure as inputs of an electrode numerical model for evaluating the electrochemical performance degradation over time.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis

Sentencas: After model validation, parametric simulations are conducted.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis

Sentencas: It is found that Ni coarsening manifests mainly in two aspects: the reduction of total three-phase boundary (TPB) length, and the lengthening of single TPB.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis

Sentencas: Based on the quantified microstructure parameters, the overpotential increase caused by Ni coarsening is obtained.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis

Sentencas: Besides, the results highlight the importance of Ni content on the temporal evolution.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis

Sentencas: The performance analysis provides an optimal range of Ni content, which can maintain a relatively low overpotential during the whole process.
Titulo: Morphology and performance evolution of anode microstructure in solid oxide fuel cell: A model-based quantitative analysis
